General.Name: EcoRodovias Infraestrutura e Logística S.A
General.Description: EcoRodovias Infraestrutura e Logística S.A. operates as an infrastructure company that operates highway concessions in Brazil. It operates Ecopátio Logística Cubatão, an intermodal logistics platform, which is the regulating site for trucks at the Port of Santos. The company is also involved in the port operations and handling and storage of export cargo at the Port of Santos, as well as regulates flow of trucks. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil. EcoRodovias Infraestrutura e Logística S.A. is a subsidiary of Primav Infraestrutura SA.
General.Address: Rua Gomes de Carvalho, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04547-005
